items.content_html: Scrivito is a JavaScript-based SaaS Content Management Service, built for digital agencies and medium to large sized businesses. This example app shows Scrivito’s features and is a great basis for your own Scrivito website projects.

items.content_html: 🦄 .yxorP Web Proxy Guzzler is a 100% SAAS(y) "plug-and-play" (PHP CURL+Composer are Optional) solution that leverages SAAS architecture to provide multi-tenancy, multiple threads, caching, and an article spinner service.
